item.description:
PLEASE BE ON TIME FOR THIS MEETUP. WE WILL BE GATHERING AT @ 3PM and waiting until 3:15 for stragglers. Then we will be moving around in the crowd of 100,000 people so it will be difficult to find eachother if you are late. Check the comments on this site for updates om our location . I will be posting updates evey 30 minutes so you can check incase you get seperated from us.For List of concerts click here

 

Click for the information here

More technical info here

 

Hi Guys, Let's celebrate the beginning of the Christmas Holiday season with Free music with light! Come see Santa Clause Light New England's Largest Christmas Tree!!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of the Sameul Adams Statue right in front of Faneuil Hall on Congress Street..I will be wearing a Santa Hat

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: FREE!! Faneuil Hall Christmas Tree Lighting Ceremony & Concert
